languages.text: "Целый мир, служащий лишь удовлетворению знати. Это воистину бессмысленно".
"An entire world serves only to satisfy the whims of nobles. The sheer pointlessness of it..."
languages.original_text: "Целый мир, служащий лишь удовлетворению знати. Это воистину бессмысленно".

languages.text: "Eine ganze Welt dient allein der Befriedigung der Launen von Adeligen. Was für eine Sinnlosigkeit ..."

traits.locale_text: "Eine ganze Welt dient allein der Befriedigung der Launen von Adeligen. Was für eine Sinnlosigkeit ..."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Un monde tout entier réduit à la servitude dans le seul but de satisfaire les caprices des aristocrates. Quelle absurdité... »
languages.original_text: "An entire world serves only to satisfy the whims of nobles. The sheer pointlessness of it..."

traits.locale_text: « Un monde tout entier réduit à la servitude dans le seul but de satisfaire les caprices des aristocrates. Quelle absurdité... »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Un mundo entero al servicio de los caprichos de la nobleza. Menuda inutilidad...».
languages.original_text: "An entire world serves only to satisfy the whims of nobles. The sheer pointlessness of it..."

traits.locale_text: «Un mundo entero al servicio de los caprichos de la nobleza. Menuda inutilidad...».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「世界全体が、貴族の気まぐれを満たすためだけに動いている。その無意味さときたら…」
languages.original_text: "An entire world serves only to satisfy the whims of nobles. The sheer pointlessness of it..."

traits.locale_text: 「世界全体が、貴族の気まぐれを満たすためだけに動いている。その無意味さときたら…」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “整个世界的存在，不过是为了满足贵族的异想天开而已。这简直是毫无意义……”
languages.original_text: "An entire world serves only to satisfy the whims of nobles. The sheer pointlessness of it..."

languages.text: "Koskoca bir dünya, yalnızca soyluların isteklerini karşılamaya yarıyor. O kadar büyük bir manasızlık ki..."
languages.original_text: "An entire world serves only to satisfy the whims of nobles. The sheer pointlessness of it..."
